ing: 1 (1 ounce) package herb and garlic soup mix
des: "This recipe is a party favorite! Everyone always requests I make it. Feel free to substitute chicken, veggies, etc. for the pepperoni. Enjoy!"
ins:
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
Mix sour cream, ricotta cheese, 3/4 cup mozzarella cheese, pepperoni, and soup mix together in a large bowl. Spread in a 9-inch baking pan. Sprinkle remaining 1/4 cup mozzarella cheese on top.
Bake in the preheated oven until center is heated through and mozzarella cheese is melted, about 30 minutes.
